channel.title: My Friend Cant Connect To My server
channel.description:
Well all my friend and other people cant connect to my server but i dont know what im doing wrong my connection is a linksys router connected to a comcast DSL box
I dont really see what i did wrong
NO-IP [img]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p201/Nickcar232/DADADAD.jpg[/img]
LINKSYS
[img]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p201/Nickcar232/asdfghjhgfdsasdfgf.jpg[/img]
i did everything else right (as in i can login by myself) with 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0
Help me ive been trying to solve this since i started creating a private server :'( :'( :'(

item.title: My Friend Cant Connect To My server
item.dc:creator: @Lexii Lexii
item.description:
@Lexii wrote:

i would put in what it is…
guessing with numbers could take a while
u have a similar setup as me
if u go to 192.168.1.1 and scroll down to where it says starting ip adress ip adress…
the last number in there should be the last number to fill in the box…
it will prob be a 1 or 100

Read full topic
item.source: My Friend Cant Connect To My server
